message:
SYSTEM: Vadim.pdf: Página 53
November 12, 2015
53
Gravitation and Fitness in Ontology Dynamics
What is an Ontology?
•
 
Ontology (in AI and Information Science): 
–
 
A “formal, explicit specification of a shared 
conceptualization” *
•
 
A descriptive theory for:
–
 
A Domain of Discourse
–
 
Common Sense
–
 
…
•
 
To explain:
–
 
Conceptualization?
–
 
Specification of a Conceptualization?
–
 
Explicit Specification?
–
 
Formal Specification?
–
 
Shared Conceptualization?
* Rudi Studer, V. Richard Benjamins, and Dieter Fensel. Knowledge Engineering: Principles and Methods. 
Data & Knowledge Engineering, 25(1-2):161–197, 1998
speaker: SYSTEM
